title: portfolio website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills, built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. The site features a fully responsive design using Flexbox and Grid, and includes a dark mode feature that persists the user's choice. Project data is loaded dynamically using JavaScript to fetch from a JSON file.

title: Gess the word game
description: An interactive web game developed with JavaScript to handle the core game logic. Players attempt to guess a hidden word within a limited number of tries. This project showcases JavaScript DOM manipulation skills for updating the UI, handling user input, and managing the game state.
